Simple SVG importer

FloatCanvas has no built-in svg importer, because the parsing step is a really complex task, especially if you start and add scripts, animations, stylesheets, filters and the like.

This demo shows how an importer which can load very very simple svg files.

If you want to make this better, you could combine it with this project: http://code.google.com/p/wxpsvg/ which already uses wx.GraphicsContext internally.
